titleStmt.title: Ane verie excellent and delectabill treatise intitulit Philotus Quhairin we may persave the greit inconveniences that fallis out in the mariage betvvene age and zouth [sic].
Philotus.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; cropped and stained with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the National Library of Scotland.
